mapper.select: SELECT r.`recordId` AS `recordId`, r.`alarmId` AS `alarmId`, r.`alarmDate` AS `alarmDate`, r.`alarmTime` AS `alarmTime`, r.`createDate` AS `createDate`, r.`dosage` AS `dosage`, r.`medName` AS `medName`, r.`url` AS `url`, r.`userId` AS `userId`, u.`userName` AS `userName`, r.`statusId` AS `statusId`, r.`type` AS `type`, sm.`status` AS `status` FROM `record` r LEFT JOIN `status_med` sm ON ((r.`statusId` = sm.`statusId`)) LEFT JOIN `user` u ON (r.`userId` = u.`userId`) where u.userId = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY r.alarmDate DESC,r.alarmTime DESC limit 100
